name: Witch of the Woods
description: In Witch of the Woods, you play as a witch who must gather ingredients in the forest in order to cast custom spells on the flora and fauna. Can you maintain the forest's ecosystem while fending off the corruption that is plaguing your woods?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7400 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 600 MB available space
